text: Kandi naho uzajya hose (ugashaka gusenga) ujye werekeza uburanga bwawe ku Musigiti Mutagatifu (Al Kaâ€™aba). Naho muzaba muri hose (mugashaka gusenga) mujye muwerekezaho uburanga bwanyu, kugira ngo abantu batazabagiraho urwitwazo, uretse abahuguje (roho zabo) muri bo (bazahora mu mpaka). Bityo ntimuzabatinye ahubwo mujye mutinya njye; kugira ngo mbahundagazeho inema zanjye no kugira ngo muyoboke
